thread.title: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 22
thread.title_full: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 22

title: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 22
text:
Be the first to comment 
Marco Djuricin gave the visitors an early lead and substitute Phillip Hofmann book-ended the game with a late second. 
In between, you couldn't even claim Wolves huffed and puffed in the first-half, such was their alarmingly subdued nature. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
